Product Title: simplyLegacy3™ 7.0mmDx13mmL SBM: 5.7mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy3 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy3™ Implant SystemFeatures & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar or for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final full-contour abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surface: SBM (Soluble Blast Media)• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 /11.5 /13 / 16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: simplyRePlant 3.5mmDx10mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
simplyRePlant dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. The mount-free packaging features a RePlant implant, cover screw, and 3mm healing collar.simplyRePlant® dental implants are two-piece, tri-lobe connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. RePlant offers a range of four implant diameters from 3.5-6.0mm with matching platforms. simplyRePlant Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one and two stage surgery.  Package includes: Implant System: Implant Features:  1: Oh, E. & Kraut R. Effect of sinus membrane perforation on dental implant integration: A retrospective on 128 patients. Implant Dentistry, 20(1): 6, Table 3.
Cover screw
3mm healing collar

Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Two cutting grooves - no bone taps required
Quadruple-lead micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Double-lead V threads
SBM surface

Product Title: Kontour Sustain Porcine Resorbable Membrane Size: 20x30mm - 1 Membrane/Box
Description:
Resorbable Membrane/Xenograft /Kontour™ Sustain Kontour™ Sustain Regenerative Collagen Dental Membrane is a white, nonfriable, conformable membrane matrix engineered from highly purified type I collagen derived from porcine tendon.Kontour™ Sustain is a natural and easy to use resorbable membrane made from highly purified Type 1 collagen harvested from porcine achilles tendon. This membrane is:
Biocompatible
Conformable but firm; allows for ease of insertion and maintenance of space above graft
Strong; has excellent suture pull out resistance
Stable; resorbs in around 6-9 months

Biocompatible
Conformable but firm; allows for ease of insertion and maintenance of space above graft
Strong; has excellent suture pull out resistance
Stable; resorbs in around 6-9 months

Product Title: simplyLegacy2™ 3.7mmDx16mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy2 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy2™ Implant SystemWith cover screw and 3mm healing collar included, our mount-free implants allow you to streamline your surgical procedures while still having the necessary, compatible components readily accessible.Features & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Body is straight for top 1/3rd with bottom 2/3rds tapered for bone expansion• Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & quadruple lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer & temporary abutment• Three aggressive self-tapping grooves extending 2/3rds length up the implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture-mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 / 11.5 / 13 / 16mm. Top 1/3 is straight with tapered section having three cutting grooves• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: 4.8/4.4mmD DLC Step Drill - Long
Description:
SD4.8C
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 5.7mmDx11.5mmL, 3.4mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 4.7mmDx6mmL, 3.4mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: 2.3/2.0mmD DLC Step Drill - Long
Description:
SD2.3C
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 4.7mmDx13mmL, 3.4mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 3.2mmDx11.5mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: simplyInterActive 3.7mmDx10mmL SBM: 3.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
SimplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. The mount-free packaging features an InterActive implant, cover screw, and 3mm healing collar.simplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. InterActive offers two restorative platforms across four implant diameters ranging from 3.2-5.0mm. simplyInterActive Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.  Package includes: Implant Features: 
Cover screw
3mm healing collar with a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

12° conical connection
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves
Micro-grooves and micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: simplyLegacy2™ 3.7mmDx8mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy2 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy2™ Implant SystemWith cover screw and 3mm healing collar included, our mount-free implants allow you to streamline your surgical procedures while still having the necessary, compatible components readily accessible.Features & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Body is straight for top 1/3rd with bottom 2/3rds tapered for bone expansion• Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & quadruple lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer & temporary abutment• Three aggressive self-tapping grooves extending 2/3rds length up the implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture-mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 / 11.5 / 13 / 16mm. Top 1/3 is straight with tapered section having three cutting grooves• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: simplyInterActive 3.2mmDx11.5mmL SBM: 3.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
SimplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. The mount-free packaging features an InterActive implant, cover screw, and 3mm healing collar.SimplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. InterActive offers two restorative platforms across four implant diameters ranging from 3.2-5.0mm.  simplyInterActive Packaging: All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery. Package includes:Implant Features:
Cover screw
3mm healing collar with a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

12° conical connection
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves
Micro-grooves and micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 3.2mmDx8mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: simplyLegacy2™ 4.7mmDx16mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy2 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy2™ Implant SystemWith cover screw and 3mm healing collar included, our mount-free implants allow you to streamline your surgical procedures while still having the necessary, compatible components readily accessible.Features & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Body is straight for top 1/3rd with bottom 2/3rds tapered for bone expansion• Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & quadruple lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer & temporary abutment• Three aggressive self-tapping grooves extending 2/3rds length up the implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture-mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 / 11.5 / 13 / 16mm. Top 1/3 is straight with tapered section having three cutting grooves• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: GoDirect 4.7mmDx13mmL, 1.5mm Collar Height SBM 4.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
GoDirect® dental implants are one-piece, tissue-level implants designed for economy in removable overdenture cases.
 
GoDirect offers a LOCATOR-compatible® interface across a range of three implant diameters from 3.0-4.7mm. GoDirect is made and sold under license from Zest IP Holdings, LLC and Zest Anchors, LLC. US Pat. 6,030,219 and 6,299,447

Implant Design



1-piece tissue-level implant for economy and strength in removable overdenture cases
Titanium nitride coated head (4.0mm platform diameter)
Two shoulder height options with 1.5mm machined surface
Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads
Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress
Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion
SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging


Includes: plastic snap-on comfort cap, implant and carrier/transfer
Plastic carrier also functions as a snap-on, closed-tray transfer

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 3.2mmDx10mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: Legacy4™ 4.7mmDx16mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy4 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.
 Legacy™ 4 - The Culmination of 30 Years of Implant Evolution Legacy4 introduces a revolutionary, new 2-piece fixture-mount/abutment that provides the accuracy of an open-tray transfer with the simplicity of a closed-tray. In addition, Legacy4 features:• A torque-safety feature to prevent damage to the implant interface• A concave transgingival profile on the fixture-mount/abutment matched with the healing collar to shape soft tissue for improved esthetics• Quadruple-lead micro-threads• Progressively deeper buttress threads• Three long cutting groovesPlease note: Healing collar must be purchased separately for 6mmL implants.

Product Title: Legacy4™ 4.7mmDx10mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy4 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.
 Legacy™ 4 - The Culmination of 30 Years of Implant Evolution Legacy4 introduces a revolutionary, new 2-piece fixture-mount/abutment that provides the accuracy of an open-tray transfer with the simplicity of a closed-tray. In addition, Legacy4 features:• A torque-safety feature to prevent damage to the implant interface• A concave transgingival profile on the fixture-mount/abutment matched with the healing collar to shape soft tissue for improved esthetics• Quadruple-lead micro-threads• Progressively deeper buttress threads• Three long cutting groovesPlease note: Healing collar must be purchased separately for 6mmL implants.

Product Title: Legacy3™ 7.0mmDx13mmL SBM: 5.7mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy3 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Tapered body allows insertion using Tapered Screw-Vent® drills for 3.7mmD, 4.2mmD & 4.7mmD implants only. Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured or HA-coated• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final preparable abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Compatible with Zimmer Dental Tapered Screw-Vent System• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Packaging: Includes cover screw, 2mm healing collar, transfer and titanium abutment• Implant Lengths: 6*/8/10/11.5/13/16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: Legacy4™ 3.7mmDx10mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy4 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.
 Legacy™ 4 - The Culmination of 30 Years of Implant Evolution Legacy4 introduces a revolutionary, new 2-piece fixture-mount/abutment that provides the accuracy of an open-tray transfer with the simplicity of a closed-tray. In addition, Legacy4 features:• A torque-safety feature to prevent damage to the implant interface• A concave transgingival profile on the fixture-mount/abutment matched with the healing collar to shape soft tissue for improved esthetics• Quadruple-lead micro-threads• Progressively deeper buttress threads• Three long cutting groovesPlease note: Healing collar must be purchased separately for 6mmL implants.

Product Title: Legacy1™ 4.7mmDx8mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy1 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package.Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevelBuilt-in platform-shiftingEvenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threadsQuadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stressTwo cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertionSBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical successIncludes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transferThe carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placementThe carrier also functions as a closed-tray transferThe 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgeryInsertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.

Implant Design



Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel


Built-in platform-shifting


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transfer


The carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placement


The carrier also functions as a closed-tray transfer


The 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery


Insertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.




Implant Design



Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel


Built-in platform-shifting


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transfer


The carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placement


The carrier also functions as a closed-tray transfer


The 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery


Insertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.

Insertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.




Implant Design



Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel


Built-in platform-shifting


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transfer


The carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placement


The carrier also functions as a closed-tray transfer


The 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery


Insertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.

Product Title: InterActive 4.3mmDx8mmL SBM: 3.4mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
InterActive dental implants are two-piece conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package.InterActive™ dental implants are conical connection two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. InterActive offers two restorative platforms across four implant diameters ranging from 3.2-5.0mm.  InterActive Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.1  Package includes: Implant Features:  1: except 6mm length implants
Cover screw
2mm healing collar1
2-piece fixture-mount with a concave transgingival profile for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

12° conical connection
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves
Micro-grooves and micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
Fixture-mount features a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation
Fixture-mount features a flat to match the flat on the internal-hex, making indexing easier
Fixture-mount functions as a closed-tray transfer
Color-coded fixture-mount top matches the implant prosthetic platform/interface
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: ScrewIndirect 5.7mmDx10mmL SBM: 5.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
ScrewIndirect® dental implants are one-piece, tissue-level implants designed for economy in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration cases. 
 
ScrewIndirect offers a single restorative platform across a range of four implant diameters from 3.0-5.7mm. 1-piece, tissue-level implant for economy and strength in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration casesMulti-unit head with retentive groove & beveled shoulder (5.0mm platform diameter)Common platform across all implant sizes for restorative simplicity2.5mm machined transgingival neckEvenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threadsQuadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stressTwo cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertionSBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical successIncludes: plastic snap-on comfort cap, 2mm extender, extender plastic carrier/transfer, implant and carrier/transferPlastic carrier also functions as a snap-on, closed-tray transfer2mm extender to raise prosthetic platform as needed based upon soft tissue heightImplant carrier/transfer and extender carrier/transfer provided in two different colors to facilitate communication with the labNote: a 2.5mmD hex driver is required for implant placement

Implant Design



1-piece, tissue-level implant for economy and strength in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration cases


Multi-unit head with retentive groove & beveled shoulder (5.0mm platform diameter)


Common platform across all implant sizes for restorative simplicity


2.5mm machined transgingival neck


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: plastic snap-on comfort cap, 2mm extender, extender plastic carrier/transfer, implant and carrier/transfer


Plastic carrier also functions as a snap-on, closed-tray transfer


2mm extender to raise prosthetic platform as needed based upon soft tissue height


Implant carrier/transfer and extender carrier/transfer provided in two different colors to facilitate communication with the lab




Implant Design



1-piece, tissue-level implant for economy and strength in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration cases


Multi-unit head with retentive groove & beveled shoulder (5.0mm platform diameter)


Common platform across all implant sizes for restorative simplicity


2.5mm machined transgingival neck


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: plastic snap-on comfort cap, 2mm extender, extender plastic carrier/transfer, implant and carrier/transfer


Plastic carrier also functions as a snap-on, closed-tray transfer


2mm extender to raise prosthetic platform as needed based upon soft tissue height

Product Title: InterActive 4.3mmDx16mmL SBM: 3.4mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
InterActive dental implants are two-piece conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package.InterActive™ dental implants are conical connection two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. InterActive offers two restorative platforms across four implant diameters ranging from 3.2-5.0mm.  InterActive Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.1  Package includes: Implant Features:  1: except 6mm length implants
Cover screw
2mm healing collar1
2-piece fixture-mount with a concave transgingival profile for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

12° conical connection
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves
Micro-grooves and micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
Fixture-mount features a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation
Fixture-mount features a flat to match the flat on the internal-hex, making indexing easier
Fixture-mount functions as a closed-tray transfer
Color-coded fixture-mount top matches the implant prosthetic platform/interface
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: Legacy1™ 3.7mmDx13mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy1 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package.Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevelBuilt-in platform-shiftingEvenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threadsQuadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stressTwo cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertionSBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical successIncludes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transferThe carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placementThe carrier also functions as a closed-tray transferThe 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgeryInsertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.

Implant Design



Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel


Built-in platform-shifting


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transfer


The carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placement


The carrier also functions as a closed-tray transfer


The 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery


Insertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.

Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: cover screw, 2mm extender and implant with titanium carrier that functions as transfer


The carrier is color-coded to the prosthetic platform and features indentations aligned to the hex flats for easy indexing during placement


The carrier also functions as a closed-tray transfer


The 2mm extender is uniquely designed to be retained by the cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery


Insertion with the carrier is optional. You can choose to remove it for implant-level insertion with a hex driver.

Product Title: ScrewIndirect 5.7mmDx8mmL SBM: 5.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
ScrewIndirect® dental implants are one-piece, tissue-level implants designed for economy in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration cases. 
 
ScrewIndirect offers a single restorative platform across a range of four implant diameters from 3.0-5.7mm. 1-piece, tissue-level implant for economy and strength in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration casesMulti-unit head with retentive groove & beveled shoulder (5.0mm platform diameter)Common platform across all implant sizes for restorative simplicity2.5mm machined transgingival neckEvenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threadsQuadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stressTwo cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertionSBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical successIncludes: plastic snap-on comfort cap, 2mm extender, extender plastic carrier/transfer, implant and carrier/transferPlastic carrier also functions as a snap-on, closed-tray transfer2mm extender to raise prosthetic platform as needed based upon soft tissue heightImplant carrier/transfer and extender carrier/transfer provided in two different colors to facilitate communication with the labNote: a 2.5mmD hex driver is required for implant placement

Implant Design



1-piece, tissue-level implant for economy and strength in multi-unit, screw-retained restoration cases


Multi-unit head with retentive groove & beveled shoulder (5.0mm platform diameter)


Common platform across all implant sizes for restorative simplicity


2.5mm machined transgingival neck


Evenly tapered implant body with double-lead “V” threads


Quadruple-lead mini-threads at the coronal aspect for reduced crestal bone stress


Two cutting grooves, extending halfway up implant for self-tapping insertion


SBM™ surface is a medium-rough surface with over 20 years of clinical success



Packaging



Includes: plastic snap-on comfort cap, 2mm extender, extender plastic carrier/transfer, implant and carrier/transfer


Plastic carrier also functions as a snap-on, closed-tray transfer


2mm extender to raise prosthetic platform as needed based upon soft tissue height


Implant carrier/transfer and extender carrier/transfer provided in two different colors to facilitate communication with the lab

Legacy2 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.

Cover screw
2mm healing collar2
Fixture-mount/closed-tray transfer

Legacy implants have demonstrated excellent clinical success, including primary stability, minimal osseous changes in the short and intermediate time frames, a stable interface, and no loose final abutment over a five-year period3

Internal hex connection (1.5mm long hex and internal lead-in bevel)
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight/tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves, no bone taps required
Quadruple-lead micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC and improved primary stability
Fixture-mount functions as a closed-tray transfer
Fixture-mount features a flat to match the flat on the internal-hex, making indexing easier
Color-coded fixture-mount top matches implant prosthetic platform/interface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: Legacy4™ 5.2mmDx16mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy4 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.
 Legacy™ 4 - The Culmination of 30 Years of Implant Evolution Legacy4 introduces a revolutionary, new 2-piece fixture-mount/abutment that provides the accuracy of an open-tray transfer with the simplicity of a closed-tray. In addition, Legacy4 features:• A torque-safety feature to prevent damage to the implant interface• A concave transgingival profile on the fixture-mount/abutment matched with the healing collar to shape soft tissue for improved esthetics• Quadruple-lead micro-threads• Progressively deeper buttress threads• Three long cutting groovesPlease note: Healing collar must be purchased separately for 6mmL implants.

Product Title: Legacy3™ 5.2mmDx10mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy3 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Tapered body allows insertion using Tapered Screw-Vent® drills for 3.7mmD, 4.2mmD & 4.7mmD implants only. Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured or HA-coated• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final preparable abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Compatible with Zimmer Dental Tapered Screw-Vent System• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Packaging: Includes cover screw, 2mm healing collar, transfer and titanium abutment• Implant Lengths: 6*/8/10/11.5/13/16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: Legacy3™ 5.7mmDx13mmL SBM: 5.7mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy3 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Tapered body allows insertion using Tapered Screw-Vent® drills for 3.7mmD, 4.2mmD & 4.7mmD implants only. Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured or HA-coated• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final preparable abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Compatible with Zimmer Dental Tapered Screw-Vent System• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Packaging: Includes cover screw, 2mm healing collar, transfer and titanium abutment• Implant Lengths: 6*/8/10/11.5/13/16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: Legacy4™ 4.2mmDx8mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
Legacy4 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. It features All-in-1 Packaging, allowing the parts needed for implant procedures to be purchased in one package. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.
 Legacy™ 4 - The Culmination of 30 Years of Implant Evolution Legacy4 introduces a revolutionary, new 2-piece fixture-mount/abutment that provides the accuracy of an open-tray transfer with the simplicity of a closed-tray. In addition, Legacy4 features:• A torque-safety feature to prevent damage to the implant interface• A concave transgingival profile on the fixture-mount/abutment matched with the healing collar to shape soft tissue for improved esthetics• Quadruple-lead micro-threads• Progressively deeper buttress threads• Three long cutting groovesPlease note: Healing collar must be purchased separately for 6mmL implants.

With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, Legacy offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.
 Legacy™ 4 - The Culmination of 30 Years of Implant Evolution Legacy4 introduces a revolutionary, new 2-piece fixture-mount/abutment that provides the accuracy of an open-tray transfer with the simplicity of a closed-tray. In addition, Legacy4 features:• A torque-safety feature to prevent damage to the implant interface• A concave transgingival profile on the fixture-mount/abutment matched with the healing collar to shape soft tissue for improved esthetics• Quadruple-lead micro-threads• Progressively deeper buttress threads• Three long cutting groovesPlease note: Healing collar must be purchased separately for 6mmL implants.

Product Title: InterActive™ Surgical Kit Mini
Description: ISKMThe InterActive™ Surgical Kit Mini is a reusable perforated instrument cassette system, including an outer case, cover, and inner tray, that is designed to hold dental instruments in place during transport, steam sterilization, and storage. The kit also includes a removable stainless-steel pan, which functions as a storage receptacle for used surgical instruments.The Mini Kits are sold EMPTY and designed with adaptability in mind, allowing clinicians to tailor the needs of a specific surgery while limiting the physical footprint of the kit. The Surgical Kits include step by step callouts for soft and dense bone drilling protocols, inlaid grommets to aid in cleaning, advanced color-coding that matches implant labels, surgical drills, and drill stops, and a visual reference of Implant Direct's DLC Drill to aid in depth marking identification.

Product Title: InterActive™ Surgical Kit
Description: ISKThe InterActive™ Surgical Kit is a reusable perforated instrument cassette system, including an outer case, cover, and inner tray, that is designed to hold dental instruments in place during transport, steam sterilization, and storage. The InterActive™ Surgical Kit supports Implant Direct implant placement protocols, as well as holds the following dental instruments: Surgical Drills, Paralleling Tools, Implant Drivers, Drill Extender, and Prosthetic Drivers. The Kits also include a removable stainless-steel pan, which functions as a storage receptacle for used surgical instruments.The Surgical Kits are sold EMPTY and designed with adaptability in mind, allowing clinicians to tailor the needs of a specific surgery. The Surgical Kits include step by step callouts for soft and dense bone drilling protocols, inlaid grommets to aid in cleaning, advanced color-coding that matches implant labels, surgical drills, and drill stops, and a visual reference of Implant Direct's DLC Drill to aid in depth marking identification.

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 3.7mmDx8mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Also for use with Legacy and Swish implants with that same platform size. This innovative new long driver design features:• Durable metal retentive spring• Axial alignment tip to prevent tool from tilting• Tissue height measuring guides in 2mm intervals to assist in correct vertical placement of implant• Flats to help you easily visualize implant indexing

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 4.2mmDx8mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: simplyLegacy3™ 3.7mmDx6mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy3 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy3™ Implant SystemFeatures & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar or for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final full-contour abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surface: SBM (Soluble Blast Media)• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 /11.5 /13 / 16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Description: Driver for simplyLegacy implants. Use is required when using simplyLegacy implants.Required for simplyLegacy implants with a 3.5mm or 4.5mm platform size. Also for use with Legacy implants and ScrewPlant & ScrewPlus implants with a 3.7mm or 4.7mm platform size as well as all ScrewIndirect implants. This driver engages all fixture mounts with a 2.5 internal hex configuration.This innovative new long driver design features:• Durable metal retentive spring• Axial alignment tip to prevent tool from tilting• Tissue height measuring guides in 2mm intervals to assist in correct vertical placement of implant• Flats to help you easily visualize implant indexing

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 3.7mmDx11.5mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: Drill Stop 5.4mmDx11.5mmL Short
Description: DSXW11SThe Drill Stop is a reusable (up to 30 osteotomies) hollow cylinder that attaches to the hub of Implant Direct's DLC Drills via an easy to use clip-on design. The Drill Stops are color coded to match the DLC Drills, Drill Stop Kit, and Surgical Kit. Drill stops are preset for 6, 8, 10, 11.5, 13, and 16mm implant lengths, providing precise control of drilling depth and reducing the risk of over-drilling an osteotomy. The Drill Stops are available in two formats (Short (S) - 6 to 13mm depth, and Long - 6-16mm depth), and in several diameters. Each Drill Stop supports two diameters of DLC drill, and is identified with a corresponding letter – N (Narrow: 2.3, 2.8mm), R (Regular: 3.4, 3.8mm), W (Wide: 4.4, 4.8mm), and XW (Extra Wide: 5.1, 5.4mm). Drill Stops are to be used exclusively with Implant Direct’s DLC Drills and drilling protocols.

Drill stops are preset for 6, 8, 10, 11.5, 13, and 16mm implant lengths, providing precise control of drilling depth and reducing the risk of over-drilling an osteotomy. The Drill Stops are available in two formats (Short (S) - 6 to 13mm depth, and Long - 6-16mm depth), and in several diameters. Each Drill Stop supports two diameters of DLC drill, and is identified with a corresponding letter – N (Narrow: 2.3, 2.8mm), R (Regular: 3.4, 3.8mm), W (Wide: 4.4, 4.8mm), and XW (Extra Wide: 5.1, 5.4mm). Drill Stops are to be used exclusively with Implant Direct’s DLC Drills and drilling protocols.

Product Title: Guided Handle Kit
Description: Guided surgery handle kit and accessories. Includes: guide handles, spacers, and spacer tool.This kit allows you to prepare guided osteotomies for any diameter implant within the Legacy, Spectra-System, RePlus and ReActive systems. Drill identification is easy with color-coded double-ended handles that match the Complete Surgical Tray (CST). The kit includes four handles, a spacer tool and four spacers (for use with the four smaller diameter handles). Dimensions: 8.5"L x 5" W x 1" H

Product Title: DLC Drill Stop Kit (Empty) - Short Drills
Description: DSKSThe Drill Stop Kit is used to store, sterilize, verify Drill Stop length, and facilitate the mounting/removal of the Drill Stops. The Drill Stop Kit includes the Release Bracket, which is used for removing Drill Stops via a push-button system, as well as verifying the length of the Drill Stops via a ruler and included depth markings. The Drill Stop Kit is small, autoclavable, and provides convenient storage and easy access to Drill Stops and DLC Drills. Drill Stops and DLC Drills can be sterilized within the Drill Stop Kit.

Product Title: Drill Stop 3.8mmDx6mmL
Description: DSR06The Drill Stop is a reusable (up to 30 osteotomies) hollow cylinder that attaches to the hub of Implant Direct's DLC Drills via an easy to use clip-on design. Product Title: 3.4/2.8mmD DLC Step Drill - Long
Description:
SD3.4C
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: 2.8/2.3mmD DLC Step Drill - Short
Description:
SD2.8CS
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Drill stops are preset for 6, 8, 10, 11.5, 13, and 16mm implant lengths, providing precise control of drilling depth and reducing the risk of over-drilling an osteotomy. The Drill Stops are available in two formats (Short (S) - 6 to 13mm depth, and Long - 6-16mm depth), and in several diameters. Each Drill Stop supports two diameters of DLC drill, and is identified with a corresponding letter – N (Narrow: 2.3, 2.8mm), R (Regular: 3.4, 3.8mm), W (Wide: 4.4, 4.8mm), and XW (Extra Wide: 5.1, 5.4mm). Drill Stops are to be used exclusively with Implant Direct’s DLC Drills and drilling protocols.

Product Title: DLC Drill Stop Kit (Empty) - Long Drills
Description: DSKLThe Drill Stop Kit is used to store, sterilize, verify Drill Stop length, and facilitate the mounting/removal of the Drill Stops. The Drill Stop Kit includes the Release Bracket, which is used for removing Drill Stops via a push-button system, as well as verifying the length of the Drill Stops via a ruler and included depth markings. The Drill Stop Kit is small, autoclavable, and provides convenient storage and easy access to Drill Stops and DLC Drills. Drill Stops and DLC Drills can be sterilized within the Drill Stop Kit.

Product Title: 3.8/3.4mmD DLC Step Drill - Short
Description:
SD3.8CS
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 4.7mmDx11.5mmL, 3.0mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: DLC Cortical Bone Drill for 7.0mmD Implant
Description:
CBD7.0C
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: Simply Iconic Implant 5.7mmDx13mmL, 3.4mmD Platform
Description: MAKE EVERYDAY EPIC. Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Simply Iconic is a conical hex implant designed for optimal primary stability and aesthetics that enables simplified treatment so you can deliver remarkable results routinely.  • An expansive range of implant diameters with two prosthetic platforms, to balance surgical versatility with restorative ease • Opportunity to treat a significant portion of cases with a single interface yet access to wider emergence profiles when needed  • Restorative components are optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation   Simply Iconic implants feature: • Conical –  12° conical hex connection/interface • Straight/tapered implant body design • Color-coded platform shift – to provide a friendly environment for the biologic width plus a clear visual indication of interface size when implants are uncovered intraorally • Coronal micro-threads – designed to increase BIC which is known to be beneficial to long-term stability in the crestal bone area • SBM™ blasted surface • Progressively-deeper buttress threads – designed for increased BIC which is known to be beneficial for primary stability in low-density bone • Equi- or subcrestal placement – for surgical adaptability  • Cutting grooves – no bone taps required Packaging supports both one or two stage surgeries and includes: • Color-coded cover screw   • 5mm concave profile healing collar for surgical efficiency

Product Title: ZEST/ZAAG Denture Cap Removal Trephine Drill
Description: Trephine DrillDrill used to remove either LOCATOR or GPS metal housings from an existing denture. It creates a recess in the acrylic slightly larger than the housing which allows space that is filled in with processing acrylic when curing in a replacement metal housing (Denture Cap). Standard processing steps can be followed once the housing is removed.

Product Title: Drill Stop 5.4mmDx16mmL
Description: DSXW16The Drill Stop is a reusable (up to 30 osteotomies) hollow cylinder that attaches to the hub of Implant Direct's DLC Drills via an easy to use clip-on design. The Drill Stops are color coded to match the DLC Drills, Drill Stop Kit, and Surgical Kit. Drill stops are preset for 6, 8, 10, 11.5, 13, and 16mm implant lengths, providing precise control of drilling depth and reducing the risk of over-drilling an osteotomy. The Drill Stops are available in two formats (Short (S) - 6 to 13mm depth, and Long - 6-16mm depth), and in several diameters. Each Drill Stop supports two diameters of DLC drill, and is identified with a corresponding letter – N (Narrow: 2.3, 2.8mm), R (Regular: 3.4, 3.8mm), W (Wide: 4.4, 4.8mm), and XW (Extra Wide: 5.1, 5.4mm). Drill Stops are to be used exclusively with Implant Direct’s DLC Drills and drilling protocols.
