Product Title: KaVo EXPERTsurg LUX
Description:
Intelligent Power and Precise Torque

One touch auto calibration guarantees precise speed and torque for maximum safety. Easy to use color display makes EXPERTsurg™ easy to operate saving you time to perform at your best.
EXPERTsurg is simple, intuitive and easy to use with large color screens and pictorial guides for step-by-step procedures. 
The units can be used for all surgical applications and offer intelligent power and precise torque. EXPERTsurg LUX surgical unit operates safely with high precision thanks to one of the world’s lightest and smallest surgical motors.
EXPERTsurg is simple, intuitive and easy to use with large color screens and pictorial guides for step-by-step procedures.One Touch Auto-Calibration - Precise speed and torque for maximum safety.SMARTdrive Technology - High torque and minimum vibration from the start.One touch auto-calibration guarantees precise speed and torque for maximum safety. KaVo enables easy and accurate calibration of the motor and instruments providing peace of mind and security for precision in implant cases. This time-saving, automatic calibration starts by just one touch of a button.Enjoy alleviation of work through freely programmable workflows with the EXPERTsurg. This product features visual icons of all working steps for quick orientation. Customize the procedure workflow: 4 to 10 program steps possible.The EXPERTsurg features large icons and a color display that allow for step by step, simple user friendly operation. Save time with intuitive programming and easy hygiene.The EXPERTsurg allows for better accessibility and ergonomics due to one of the world’s lightest and smallest micro-motors. The light and small motor together with the flexible motor tubing allows ergonomic and fatigue-free working.The EXPERTsurg features an Intuitive user interface with symbolic references and color display allowing for accurate display of adjusted maximum torque and motor speed.Complete surgery kit includes: surgery motor INTRA LUX S600, multi-function foot control (cable length 2.5m), motor tubing for S600 LED, start up hose set (5 off), motor and instrument holder, bottle holder, integrated peristaltic pump.

Guaranteed Precision, Maximum Safety

One touch auto calibration guarantees precise speed and torque for maximum safety
One of the World’s lightest and smallest surgical micro-motors
Smooth running, low vibration

High Reliability, Top Performance

80 Ncm torque at the instrument
SMARTdrive™ technology for high torque and minimum vibration at the start

Time Saving Easy-to-Use Functions and Features

Intuitive, straight forward programming
Symbolic references and color display
Easy to clean

Technical Specifications

Input voltage 100 V-240 V
Input frequency 50/60 Hz
Pump flow rate 0-110 mL/min

Product Title: Legacy Scan Adapter (4.5mmD Platform) - 1/Box
Description: Scan adapter for Legacy implants.Used by a clinician with an IOS and a dental lab with a model scanner, a scan adapter captures the position and orientation of a dental implant or lab analog during the digital scanning process. They are manufactured from Peek material with a titanium base interface. The body is non-flared for easier placement as well as a solution for sub-crestal implant placement. The titanium base interface provides a more precise fit and greater visual clarity on an x-ray.

Product Title: SMARTbase Ti Base Abutment Legacy 3.0mmD Platform / 1mmL Collar
Description: 8730-81SMARTbase engaging Ti-base abutment featuring dual hue anodization & off-axis screw channel. With its "Floating Screw" option, the fixation screw can be pre-assembled into the base prior to placement for easier seating of restoration. Available with a transgingival concave shape and in a variety of cuff heights and profile widths for improved aesthetics. Supports both a digital & traditional workflow and is packaged with burnout coping and Tri-Grip fixation screw.

Product Title: 2.8/2.3mmD DLC Step Drill - Long
Description:
SD2.8C
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: 2.3/2.0mmD DLC Step Drill - Short
Description:
SD2.3CS
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: simplyLegacy2™ 3.2mmDx8mmL SBM: 3.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy2 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy2™ Implant SystemWith cover screw and 3mm healing collar included, our mount-free implants allow you to streamline your surgical procedures while still having the necessary, compatible components readily accessible.Features & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Body is straight for top 1/3rd with bottom 2/3rds tapered for bone expansion. • Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & quadruple lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer & temporary abutment• Three aggressive self-tapping grooves extending 2/3rds length up the implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture-mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 / 11.5 / 13 / 16mm. Top 1/3 is straight with tapered section having three cutting grooves• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: Legacy Scan Adapter (3.0mmD Platform) - 1/Box
Description: Scan adapter for Legacy implants.Used by a clinician with an IOS and a dental lab with a model scanner, a scan adapter captures the position and orientation of a dental implant or lab analog during the digital scanning process. They are manufactured from Peek material with a titanium base interface. The body is non-flared for easier placement as well as a solution for sub-crestal implant placement. The titanium base interface provides a more precise fit and greater visual clarity on an x-ray.

Product Title: DirectGen Mineralized Cancellous Allograft Granules Size: 1000-2000µm (0.5cc) - 1 Vial/Box
Description: Allograft / DirectGen™ - DirectGen is an allograft ideally suited for optimal results in a variety of surgical applications.DirectGen™ Allograft is a natural, safe and easy to use grafting material. Processed for minimal tissue manipulation, this allograft material acts as a 3-dimensional osteoconductive scaffold for new bone formation. DirectGen™ Allograft offers a choice of donated tissue types (cortical, cancellous or cortical-cancellous blend) and is suited for a wide range of clinical needs. Product Title: DirectGen Demineralized Cortical Allograft Granules Size: 125-850µm (1cc) - 1 Vial/Box
Description: Allograft / DirectGen™ - DirectGen is an allograft ideally suited for optimal results in a variety of surgical applications.DirectGen™ Allograft is a natural, safe and easy to use grafting material. Processed for minimal tissue manipulation, this allograft material acts as a 3-dimensional osteoconductive scaffold for new bone formation. DirectGen™ Allograft offers a choice of donated tissue types (cortical, cancellous or cortical-cancellous blend) and is suited for a wide range of clinical needs. Product Type: Demineralized Cort/Can Blend Particle size: 125-710µm Volume: 1cc Jars/Box: 1 Blend Ratio: 50% Cortical/50% Cancellous

Product Title: 4.4/3.8mmD Step Drill with 6-10mm Markings

Product Title: 5.4/4.8mmD DLC Step Drill - Long
Description:
SD5.4C
DLC Drills have a higher contrast coating for better visibility of drill depth markings
The added drill color coding makes identification and organization of drills easier. The color-coding matches the surgical kit and the implant vial label
The new short DLC drills have longer flutes as well as 11.5mm and 13mm depth marks to enable placement of implants up to 13mm in length
The Diamond-Like Carbon Coating (DLC) is a coating process that enhances the wear resistance of biomedical components while maintaining low friction and bioinertial properties
Within the DLC drill line, there are four different hub sizes that vary by diameter to minimize the hub width and reduce the possibility of interference
The DLC drill hub provides a secure fit for Implant Direct Drill Stops to attach, aligning with preset Drill Stop diameters
DLC drills are indicated for drilling up to 30 osteotomies per drill at a recommended maximum of 1200RPM
The overall length of the long DLC Drills (6-16mmL) is 36.6mm and the overall length of the short DLC Drills (6-13mmL) is 30.6mm
DLC drills are made of stainless-steel meeting the ASTM A564 standard

Product Title: simplyLegacy2™ 3.7mmDx6mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy2 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy2™ Implant SystemWith cover screw and 3mm healing collar included, our mount-free implants allow you to streamline your surgical procedures while still having the necessary, compatible components readily accessible.Features & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Body is straight for top 1/3rd with bottom 2/3rds tapered for bone expansion• Surface options: SBM (Soluble Blast Media) textured• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & quadruple lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar for one stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer & temporary abutment• Three aggressive self-tapping grooves extending 2/3rds length up the implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture-mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 / 11.5 / 13 / 16mm. Top 1/3 is straight with tapered section having three cutting grooves• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead progressively deeper buttress threads

Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design

SBM surface

Description: Allograft / DirectGen™ - DirectGen is an allograft ideally suited for optimal results in a variety of surgical applications.DirectGen™ Allograft is a natural, safe and easy to use grafting material. DirectGen™ Allograft offers a choice of donated tissue types (cortical, cancellous or cortical-cancellous blend) and is suited for a wide range of clinical needs. Product Title: SMARTbase Ti Base Abutment Legacy 4.5mmD Platform / 2mmL Collar
Description: 8745-82SMARTbase engaging Ti-base abutment featuring dual hue anodization & off-axis screw channel. With its "Floating Screw" option, the fixation screw can be pre-assembled into the base prior to placement for easier seating of restoration. Supports both a digital & traditional workflow and is packaged with burnout coping and Tri-Grip fixation screw.

Product Title: SwishPlus Implant 3.3mmDx12mmL SBM: 3.7mmD Platform Implant Dental System - 1/Pack
Description:
SwishPlus™ dental implants are two-piece, tissue-level octagon connection1 implants for single-stage surgical procedures. All-in-1 Packaging includes implant, cover screw, healing collar extender, and carrier that functions as a transfer. SwishPlus™ dental implants are two-piece, tissue-level octagon connection1 implants for single-stage surgical procedures. SwishPlus offers a range of four implant diameters from 3.3-5.7mm with two platform options for the 4.8mm size.  SwishPlus Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging includes: Implant Features:  1: except narrow 3.3mm implant
Cover screw
2mm healing collar
Color-coded carrier/transfer

Internal octagon connection (except for 3.3mm implant which has an internal hex)
1mm machined transgingival collar on a 2mm flared neck
Straight implant body design (except 3.3mm which has a tapered design)
Single-lead buttress threads
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased bone-implant contact and improved primary stability
Carrier features indentations to match the flats on the internal connection, making indexing easier
Carrier functions as a closed-tray transfer
Color-coded carrier matches implant prosthetic platform/interface
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: DirectOss Anorganic Cancellous Xenograft Granules Size: 0.25mm-1mm (0.25cc) - 1 Syringe/Box
Description: DXCA251025SDirectOss' slow resorbing support for integrative new bone growth allows you to treat with confidence. This natural hydroxyapatite extracted from bovine cancellous bone boasts greater inner surface area than comparable materials on the market - giving it more space for osteoblast adhesion as well as high hydrophilicity for rapid vascularization. ANORGANIC CANCELLOUS GRANULES • 100% natural hydroxyapatite extracted from bovine cancellous bone • Derived from BSE-free herds in Australia • Mimics human bone both structurally and chemically • Sintered at a low temperature to reduce crystallinity content • Supports new bone in-growth throughout each granule due to its interconnected macro, meso and micro pore structure • Packaged in both vials and syringes for easy delivery • Gamma irradiated to SAL 10-6 for sterility

Product Title: Kontour Matrix 30x40mm Membrane - 1/Box
Description: KMAX3040Kontour Matrix is composed of a network of highly purified porcine collagen fibers intermingled with highly purified porcine elastin fibers. The membrane is designed to protect the bone defect space in order to establish an environment favorable for bone regeneration by preventing the migration of undesired cells from the surrounding soft tissue and allowing the ingrowth of osteogenic cells.Kontour Matrix is hydrophilic and retains its structural integrity also in the wet state, there is no preferred orientation of Kontour Matrix during application. Due to the high stability of Kontour Matrix, the stretch and pliability provides superior handling that does not tear during augmentation or ridge preservation procedures.The Dental Barrier Membrane is offered in three sizes (15x20mm, 25x30mm, and 30x40mm).

Product Title: simplyLegacy3™ 3.7mmDx10mmL SBM: 3.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy3 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy3™ Implant SystemFeatures & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar or for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final full-contour abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surface: SBM (Soluble Blast Media)• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 /11.5 /13 / 16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: simplyLegacy3™ 5.2mmDx11.5mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
simplyLegacy3 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. The mount-free packaging features a Legacy3 implant, cover screw, and 3mm healing collar. 
With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, simplyLegacy3 offers a greater range of dimensional options than Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent® & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.simplyLegacy™3 dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. With seven implant diameters and six implant lengths, simplyLegacy3 offers a greater range of dimensional options. simplyLegacy3 Packaging:  Mount-free packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.  Package includes: System Features: Implant Features:  1: Compared to Zimmer Biomet Tapered Screw-Vent & Eztetic™, BioHorizons® Tapered Internal, or MIS® SEVEN implant systems.2: Cavallaro, J. S., Jr. (2017). Analysis of a platform-switched, coronally mini-threaded, textured dental implant: 100 percent survival rate. European Journal for Dental Implantologists, 14(2), 6.
Cover screw
3mm healing collar

Legacy implants have demonstrated excellent clinical success, including primary stability, minimal osseous changes in the short and intermediate time frames, a stable interface, and no loose final abutment over a five-year period.2

Internal hex connection (1.5mm long hex and internal lead in bevel)
Tapered implant body design
Two cutting grooves, no bone taps required
Quadruple-lead micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC and improved primary stability
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Cover screw
3mm healing collar

Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy3™ Implant SystemFeatures & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar or for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final full-contour abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surface: SBM (Soluble Blast Media)• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 /11.5 /13 / 16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Zest LOCATOR abutment compatible with SwishPlus and SwishTapered implantsZEST LOCATOR® abutment. Includes 1 abutment. Requires a LOCATOR Driver (such as LDT or LDD) or the LOCATOR Core Tool for insertion. Intermixing GPS® and LOCATOR® abutments within the same case is not recommended due to some height differences between these abutments. For further information on the differences, please call our Technical Services team. Note: This abutment can only be used with SwishPlus™ and SwishTapered™ implants with a 4.8mm platform.

Product Title: Kontour Sustain Porcine Resorbable Membrane Size: 30x40mm - 1 Membrane/Box
Description:
Resorbable Membrane/Xenograft /Kontour™ Sustain Kontour™ Sustain Regenerative Collagen Dental Membrane is a white, nonfriable, conformable membrane matrix engineered from highly purified type I collagen derived from porcine tendon.Kontour™ Sustain is a natural and easy to use resorbable membrane made from highly purified Type 1 collagen harvested from porcine achilles tendon. This membrane is:
Biocompatible
Conformable but firm; allows for ease of insertion and maintenance of space above graft
Strong; has excellent suture pull out resistance
Stable; resorbs in around 6-9 months

Biocompatible
Conformable but firm; allows for ease of insertion and maintenance of space above graft
Strong; has excellent suture pull out resistance
Stable; resorbs in around 6-9 months

Product Title: OsteoPlug 06x25mm Slim (5 Pack)
Description:
OGP0625OSTEOPLUG™ is a calcium phosphate-based mineral with a synthetic carbonate apatite structure which is like natural bone. The similarity in structure between the OSTEOPLUG™ mineral and natural anorganic bone mineral mimics natural bone as shown in vivo resorption and remodeling profiles.


Ease of use for socket sites treated with composite plug
Expands to fill socket site when hydrated
Offered in two sizes conveniently packaged five per box

Product Title: Cytoplast Anterior Titanium reinforced d-PTFE Non-Resorbable Membrane Size: 14x24mm - 1 Membrane/Box
Description:
Non-Resorbable Membrane/Cytoplast™ Ti250
Non-resorbable - High-Density PTFE MembraneCytoplast Titanium Reinforced Non Resorbable membranes This membrane is ideal for narrow single-tooth extraction sites, especially where one or more bony walls are missing. Dimensions: 14x24mm Quantity: 1 membranes/ box• Non Resorbable: no disruption of healing due to premature resorption• Made from dense PTFE with titanium insert: pore size less than 0.3μm which is impervious to bacteria• Primary closure not required: membrane easily removed• Malleable titanium insert: ideal for creating space in defects missing 1-3 bony walls• Comes in a variety of site specific shapes and can be easily trimmed to fit site

Product Title: Standard Surgical Kit Mini
Description: SSKMThe Standard Surgical Kit Mini is a reusable perforated instrument cassette system, including an outer case, cover, and inner tray, that is designed to hold dental instruments in place during transport, steam sterilization, and storage. The kit also includes a removable stainless-steel pan, which functions as a storage receptacle for used surgical instruments.The Standard layout supports Legacy™, ReActive®, and Spectra-System® drill sequences.The Mini Kits are sold EMPTY and designed with adaptability in mind, allowing clinicians to tailor the needs of a specific surgery while limiting the physical footprint of the kit. The Surgical Kits include step by step callouts for soft and dense bone drilling protocols, inlaid grommets to aid in cleaning, advanced color-coding that matches implant labels, surgical drills, and drill stops, and a visual reference of Implant Direct's DLC Drill to aid in depth marking identification.

Product Title: Standard Surgical Kit
Description: SSKThe Standard Surgical Kit is a reusable perforated instrument cassette system, including an outer case, cover, and inner tray, that is designed to hold dental instruments in place during transport, steam sterilization, and storage. The Standard Surgical Kit supports Implant Direct implant placement protocols, as well as holds the following dental instruments: Surgical Drills, Paralleling Tools, Implant Drivers, Drill Extender, and Prosthetic Drivers. The Kits also include a removable stainless-steel pan, which functions as a storage receptacle for used surgical instruments.The Standard layout supports Legacy™, ReActive®, and Spectra-System® drill sequences.The Surgical Kits are sold EMPTY and designed with adaptability in mind, allowing clinicians to tailor the needs of a specific surgery. The Surgical Kits include step by step callouts for soft and dense bone drilling protocols, inlaid grommets to aid in cleaning, advanced color-coding that matches implant labels, surgical drills, and drill stops, and a visual reference of Implant Direct's DLC Drill to aid in depth marking identification.

Product Title: Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit
Description: Convert existing dentures quickly and precisely with the Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit. This comprehensive kit, highly recommend by Clinicians Report evaluators1, includes:• Recess Bur – uniquely designed to prepare the exact size recess for LOCATOR and SATURNO Denture Attachment Housings (Denture Caps) • Undercut Bur – to create an undercut in the recess to enhance mechanical retention• Vent Hole Bur – to create a lingual vent hole for excess attachment processing material• Trim Bur – to remove excess attachment processing material and make modifications to the denture as needed• Grind Bur – to remove excess attachment processing material around the Denture Attachment Housings as needed• Polisher – to smooth and polish the attachment processing material“The CHAIRSIDE Denture Prep and Polish Kit is well organized which makes it easy for me to navigate through the denture preparation steps. The custom Recess Bur significantly cuts down on the time it takes me to create the appropriately sized recess for the LOCATOR denture attachment housings.”Charles Mastrovich, DDSEscondido, CA1Clinicians Report, December 2016, Vol 9, Issue 12, 3.

Product Title: Chairside Processing Material -18ml

Product Title: Chairside Recess Bur
Description: The Chairside Recess Bur is uniquely designed to quickly and easily prepare the exact size recess for the LOCATOR and SATURNO Denture Attachment Housings (Denture Caps). During denture conversion, use the CHAIRSIDE Recess Bur to create a space in the denture that is appropriately sized to provide the necessary clearance for the proper luting of ZEST LOCATOR® and SATURNO™ Denture Attachment Housings (Denture Caps). This efficient bur has distinct depth landmarks which indicate where to stop when drilling for each type of housing.In addition to this individual replacement bur, the Chairside Recess Bur is included in Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit.

Product Title: Chairside Trim Bur
Description: During denture conversion, use the CHAIRSIDE Undercut Bur to create an undercut in the recess which will enhance the mechanical retention of the Denture Attachment Housings.In addition to this individual replacement bur, the Chairside Undercut Bur is included in Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit.

Product Title: Chairside Processing Material -4mL
Description: Convert existing dentures easily and efficiently with Zest Dental Solutions’ Chairside Attachment Processing Material. This 8g (4ml) syringe, one of two available sizes, is suited for pickup of denture attachment housings.15x suitable for approximately 15 uses (2 attachment cases)Includes: Dual syringe, 15 mixing tips and 15 angled tips.Cost Efficient• No primer required for reduced chairtime• Shorter mixing tip reduces material waste and cost per case*Simple Application • Ideal viscosity for accurate application• Bonds to itself for efficient void fill and touch-ups• Dual cure capability provides convenient self or light cure flexibilityPatient Friendly• Low curing temperature ensures patient comfort • Odorless and tasteless to increase patient acceptance”CHAIRSIDE Attachment Processing Material by ZEST Anchors is a game-changer!” ZEST has developed a material that is perfect for processing attachments...It’s so easy to use, no messy primer is required, and the material offers dual-curing flexibility (self or light), thereby making the time I spend connecting the denture caps to the overdenture highly efficient and effective.” Michael Scherer, DMD, MS, FACP Sonora, California USAUse with Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit for greatest efficiency and precision. *Compared to the leading brands.

Product Title: InterActive Scan Adapter (3.0mmD Platform) - 1/Box
Description: Scan adapter for InterActive implants.Used by a clinician with an IOS and a dental lab with a model scanner, a scan adapter captures the position and orientation of a dental implant or lab analog during the digital scanning process. They are manufactured from Peek material with a titanium base interface. The body is non-flared for easier placement as well as a solution for sub-crestal implant placement. The titanium base interface provides a more precise fit and greater visual clarity on an x-ray.

Product Title: Chairside Vent Hole Bur
Description: During denture conversion, use the CHAIRSIDE Vent Hole Bur to make a hole from the bottom of the recess through the lingual wall of the denture, which will enable excess CHAIRSIDE Attachment Processing Material to flow from the prosthesis. It will also increase visibility of the Denture Attachment Housings within the recess providing predictable attachment pickup.In addition to this individual replacement bur, the Chairside Vent Hole Bur is included in Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit.

Product Title: Chairside Grind Bur
Description: During denture conversion, use the CHAIRSIDE Grind Bur to remove excess CHAIRSIDE Attachment Processing Material around the Denture Attachment Housings, if needed.In addition to this individual replacement bur, the Chairside Grind Bur is included in Chairside Denture Prep and Polish Kit.

Product Title: simplyInterActive 3.7mmDx11.5mmL SBM: 3.0mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
SimplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. The mount-free packaging features an InterActive implant, cover screw, and 3mm healing collar.simplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. InterActive offers two restorative platforms across four implant diameters ranging from 3.2-5.0mm. simplyInterActive Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.  Package includes: Implant Features: 
Cover screw
3mm healing collar with a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

12° conical connection
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves
Micro-grooves and micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Cover screw
3mm healing collar with a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size

Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

The mount-free packaging features an InterActive implant, cover screw, and 3mm healing collar.simplyInterActive dental implants are two-piece conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. InterActive offers two restorative platforms across four implant diameters ranging from 3.2-5.0mm. simplyInterActive Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.  Package includes: Implant Features: 
Cover screw
3mm healing collar with a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

12° conical connection
Color-coded prosthetic interface for clear visual indication of interface size
Straight / tapered implant body design
Three cutting grooves
Micro-grooves and micro-threads on coronal aspect designed to increase bone-implant contact (BIC) and long-term stability in crestal bone area
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased BIC, which can improve primary stability in low-density bone
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Cover screw
3mm healing collar with a concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas and designed to enable subcrestal placement with reduced hard tissue manipulation

Product Title: simplyLegacy3™ 5.2mmDx16mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy3 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy3™ Implant SystemFeatures & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar or for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final full-contour abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surface: SBM (Soluble Blast Media)• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 /11.5 /13 / 16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads

Product Title: SwishActive 4.1mmDx8mmL SBM: 3.4mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
SwishActive™ dental implants are two-piece, bone-level conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. All-in-1 Packaging includes implant, cover screw, healing collar extender, and carrier that functions as a transfer.SwishActive™ dental implants are two-piece, bone-level conical connection implants for single-stage or two-stage surgical procedures. SwishActive offers two restorative platforms across three implant diameters ranging from 3.3-4.8mm. SwishActive Packaging:  All-in-1 Packaging supports both one- and two-stage surgery.1  Package includes: Implant Features:  1: except 6mm length implants
Cover screw
2mm concave profile healing collar1
Color-coded carrier/transfer

12° conical connection
Straight implant body design 
Single-lead buttress threads
Progressively-deeper buttress threads designed for increased bone-implant contact and improved primary stability
Carrier features indentations to match the flats on the internal connection, making indexing easier
Carrier functions as a closed-tray transfer
Color-coded carrier matches implant prosthetic platform/interface
Healing collar extender with concave transgingival profile optimized for esthetic areas 
SBM surface
Made in the USA from medical-grade titanium alloy

Product Title: Education PASSPORT
Description: EDUPASSPORTTypically available exclusively at our Las Vegas Education Center, the ID Education PASSPORT gives you unlimited access to our core curriculum courses for 2 years with at least 50% savings in tuition.

Product Title: Making Breakthroughs in Implant Dentistry - December 9-10, 2022 - Las Vegas, NV
Description:
• Fabrication of a screw retained implant supported bridge with prosthetic soft tissue
• Timing of implant placement in complex cases with congruent specialty treatment
• Orthodontic ridge development for enhanced esthetics
• Management of the failing implant
• Restoring the edentulous patient; removable and fixed options
 
Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  JB White, DDS
Course Location:  UNLV School of Dental Medicine, 1700 W Charleston Blvd., Building D, Second Floor, Las Vegas, NV 89102

Product Title: HYBRIDGE "Advanced Full Arch Techniques" - December 2-3, 2022 - Virtual Lecture
Description:
1. Navigate full arch cases, from surgical to restorative
2. Significantly reduce doctor chair time, maximizing productivity
3. Minimize the time to final delivery for patient satisfaction
4. Utilize the Hybridge full arch specialty laboratory for durable, long-lasting, full arch prostheses
5. Use the Hybridge XD digital protocol to deliver a definitive full arch within two weeks of surgery
 
Course Length:  2-Day
Course Location:  Virtual

Product Title: Getting Started in Implant Dentistry - December 2-3, 2022, Las Vegas, NV
Description:
1. Gain knowledge and understanding in the area of surgical implant placement, using a detailed and methodical approach that will allow dentists to start surgical procedures in their own practice2. After this course, dentists should feel competent and ready to start a simple, posterior implant practice immediately3. Be able to create treatment plans for case selection, surgical site assessment, implant selection, biomaterials selection, and patient management
 
Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  Xavier Saab, DDS
Course Location:  UNLV School of Dental Medicine, 1700 W Charleston Blvd., Building D, Second Floor, Las Vegas, NV 89102

Product Title: Bread and Butter Implant Dentistry - November 18-19, 2022 - Las Vegas, NV
Description:
•             How to select the right patient and formulate the correct treatment plan
•             How to perform tooth extractions from the "simplest" to the most "complicated"
•             When to place an immediate implant in the anterior and posterior areas and how
•             How to recognize and avoid surgical complications
•             What to do when things get "complicated"
•             When can you place an immediate provisional and when is it better to wait?
•             How to develop an adequate emergence profile for the restoration starting at implant placement
 
Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  Dr. Hans Sperling, DMD, FAGD, FICOI
Course Location:  UNLV School of Dental Medicine, 1700 W Charleston Blvd., Building D, Second Floor, Las Vegas, NV 89102In today’s dental practice, technology can play a big role. We have advanced diagnostic and treatment planning methods as well as surgical guides that could simplify implant placement. Therefore, making it easier for a general dentist to start placing dental implants.A common obstacle in our implant practice is the presence of a tooth that needs to be extracted. Without the proper training, tooth extractions could be very frustrating for the patient, the dentist, and even the staff. Most extractions performed in dental school were “simple” extractions. Anything complicated was reserved for the Oral Surgery or the Periodontics residents.  There are a lot of patients with missing teeth. Many started with a tooth that was extracted and a grafted site, ultimately leading to the patient becoming comfortable with their edentulous area. A tooth that is properly extracted and immediately replaced with a dental implant could greatly benefit the patient and the dental practice. This is the bread and butter of my implant practice, and it can be your bread and butter too.

Product Title: Comprehensive Implant Training Continuum
Description:
Case review from the previous day’s surgery
Immediate implant placement
Immediate hands-on experience
Practical final exam with pig heads
Introduction to piezo surgery
Introduction to sinus lift
PRP & PRF fabrication for bone graft
Take home final exam
Final Exam Review
Prosthetics hands-on
Day 1 is live surgical observation covering immediate implant placements. Day 2 covers immediate implants, introduction to the sinus lift/bump, and demonstration of Implant Direct implants designed for the sinus areas i.e. shorter and wider implant placements on pig jaws.

Product Title: Implant Site Development II - November 11-12, 2022 - Las Vegas, NV
Description:
Implant -Soft tissue interface
Free gingival grafting
Connective tissue grafting
Dermis allograft for soft tissue grafting
Sinus anatomy
Lateral wall sinus lift procedure
Internal sinus lift procedure
Autologous growth factors for accelerated wound healing

 
Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  Todd Sawisch, DDS & Avi Schetritt, DMD
Course Location:  UNLV School of Dental Medicine, 1700 W Charleston Blvd., Building D, Second Floor, Las Vegas, NV 89102

Product Title: Live Surgical Implant Placement - November 4-5, 2022 - Aurora, CO
Description:
Learn to select patients for straightforward implant surgery and restoration
Understand treatment and case planning
Explore appropriate surgical and restorative approaches along with Implant Direct components needed for cases
Understand pre- and post-operative care
Course attendees are encouraged to bring their own patient. This would allow for following up and restoring the case. If course attendee does not bring their own patient, a patient will be provided.
Course attendee must submit x-rays and documentation to mentor 2 weeks prior to course. Attendee will be responsible for patient's transportation and lodging if applicable.

 
Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  Dr. Jim Craig
Course Location:  Aurora, COOPEN STATE - ALL Doctors are welcome. This course is intended for dentists who want to integrate both the surgical and restorative phases of dental implants into their daily practice. The course will focus on patient selection, treatment planning, critical anatomical structures, and surgical placement. Restorative options with ID implant systems are presented and discussed as well. Each attendee will place one implant in the posterior. Attendee must submit copy of license and proof of insurance.  OUT OF STATE DOCTORS ARE WELCOME! A copy of your dental license and proof of malpractice insurance required.

Product Title: HYBRIDGE "Advanced Full Arch Techniques" - October 28-29, 2022 - Virtual Lecture
Description:
1. Navigate full arch cases, from surgical to restorative
2. Significantly reduce doctor chair time, maximizing productivity
3. Minimize the time to final delivery for patient satisfaction
4. Utilize the Hybridge full arch specialty laboratory for durable, long-lasting, full arch prostheses
5. Use the Hybridge XD digital protocol to deliver a definitive full arch within two weeks of surgery
 
Course Length:  2-Day
Course Location:  Virtual

Product Title: Leveling Up Immediate Implant Dentistry - November 4-5, 2022 - Las Vegas, NV
Description:
• Explore the scientific evidence that supports immediate placement/provisionalization
• Identify the specific surgical and prosthetic protocols to obtain long-term success
• Understand the advantages and limitations of immediate load and provisionalization
• Manage and avoid complications based on surgical/prosthetic protocols
• Learn techniques to evaluate and diagnose cases to determine the ideal surgical protocol
• Maximize esthetic outcomes in the smile zone using less invasive techniques
• Use "decision trees" to develop treatment plans based on specific case scenarios
 
Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  Brian Jackson, DDS
Course Location:  UNLV School of Dental Medicine, 1700 W Charleston Blvd., Building D, Second Floor, Las Vegas, NV 89102

Product Title: Lifestyle and Legacy - October 21-22, 2022 - Las Vegas, NV
Description:
Money in Your Life and Practice
The New Patient Experience/Phone Call
Beliefs – Mastering Your Thoughts
Trust and Value in Yourself/Team/Patients
Stages in the Life of a Practice
Self Esteem and Self Worth – Knowing Your Value
Leadership and Engagement
Flow – Seeking Fulfillment in Everyday Practice
Profitability Model for Practice
Dental “Insurance”

Course Length:  2-Day
Instructor:  JB White, DDS
Course Location:  UNLV School of Dental Medicine, 1700 W Charleston Blvd., Building D, Second Floor, Las Vegas, NV 89102Navigating your career in today’s dental climate is challenging. Many dentists quickly realize our profession and their life is very different from what they expected. Instead of a rewarding career helping others and honing our clinical skills, we find ourselves just trying to survive. Drowning in debt, afraid of making poor practice ownership decisions, we have few options and little control. We ask around and start to understand that the mature dentists in our community have few answers, many have become discouraged, their future uncertain and time limited. This course is a blueprint for the courageous. Those who want to take themselves and their team and create the practice of their dreams. This course is for practice owners, future practice owners, spouses, and all dental team members.

Product Title: Standard Surgical Kit Package
Description: The Standard Surgical Kit is a reusable perforated instrument cassette system, including an outer case, cover, and inner tray, that is designed to hold dental instruments in place during transport, steam sterilization, and storage. The Standard Surgical Kit supports Implant Direct implant placement protocols, as well as holds the following dental instruments: Surgical Drills, Paralleling Tools, Implant Drivers, Drill Extender, and Prosthetic Drivers. The Kits also include a removable stainless-steel pan, which functions as a storage receptacle for used surgical instruments.The Standard layout supports Legacy™, ReActive®, and Spectra-System® drill sequences.The Surgical Kits are sold EMPTY and designed with adaptability in mind, allowing clinicians to tailor the needs of a specific surgery. The Surgical Kits include step by step callouts for soft and dense bone drilling protocols, inlaid grommets to aid in cleaning, advanced color-coding that matches implant labels, surgical drills, and drill stops, and a visual reference of Implant Direct's DLC Drill to aid in depth marking identification.

simplyLegacy3™ 4.7mmDx11.5mmL SBM: 4.5mmD Platform Dental Implant System - 1/Pack
Description:
One of our simplyIntegrated solutions, simplyLegacy3 is a mount-free implant that includes the components you need for the surgical phase of treatment:
• Implant
• Cover screw
• 3mm healing collar
Pair with the treatment-specific prosthetic SMART PACKS that fits your case to realize the full benefits of this revolutionary system.Implant Direct simplyLegacy3™ Implant SystemFeatures & Benefits• Internal connection with 1.5mm long hex & internal lead-in bevel• Double-lead buttress threads for improved insertion & initial stability, quadruple-lead threads near top for increased thread engagement & reduced stress• 2mm extender retained by cover screw for use as a healing collar or for one or two-stage surgery• Color-coded carrier usable as a closed-tray transfer and/or final full-contour abutment• Two self-tapping grooves, extending halfway up implant• Surgical flexibility with multiple insertion options: choose between implant level insertion with hex driver or fixture- mount insertion with either 2.5mm hex driver or ratchet• Connection: Color-coded internal hex with lead-in bevel• Surface: SBM (Soluble Blast Media)• Surgical Instruments: Spectra-System surgical kit• Implant Lengths: 6 / 8 / 10 /11.5 /13 / 16mm. Even taper with two cutting grooves halfway up implant• Implant Threads: Micro-threads with double-lead, progressively deeper buttress threads
